description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Bayer Leverkusen vs Borussia M'gladbach in the Bundesliga
title: Bayer Leverkusen vs Borussia M'gladbach: Bundesliga stats & head-to-head
title_page: Bayer Leverkusen vs Borussia M'gladbach: Bundesliga stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Attempt saved. Julian Weigl (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Goal!
Goal! Bayer 04 Leverkusen 3, Borussia Mönchengladbach 1. Tim Kleindienst (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Luca Netz with a cross.
Post
Fourth official has announced 3 minutes of added time.
